author: rooneg
msg: (get_copy_inheritance): Stop declaring the copy variable twice.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Properly decorate all functions in ra_serf.h to confirm to style
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/ra_serf.h: Add in svn_ra_serf__ prefix to all
functions and structure declared in this file.

author: xsteve
msg: Improved the file saving before a commit
svn-status-do-prompt-for-save: New variable to make buffer saving optional.
(svn-status-save-some-buffers): New function to ask the user, if a
file in a given subtree should be saved if it is modified
Additionally returns nil, if not in a subversion working copy.

author: malcolm
msg: Update comments, particularly in the section dealing with the reporter
interface, where the comments focussed on implementation details that
were no longer correct.  Also clarify some text and fix a handful of
doc-comment errors and overly-specific references to the BDB back-end.

author: lundblad
msg: Merge r18660 from trunk to the 1.3.x branch.
Be more thorough about checking for canonical paths.
